mapper.select: SELECT EQUIP_NO id, concat(EQUIP_NAME,'(',EQUIP_NO,')') text FROM tb_equip WHERE EQUIP_TYPE = #{equipType}
SELECT PARTS_NO id, concat(PARTS_NAME,'(',PARTS_NO,')') text FROM tb_equip_parts WHERE EQUIP_NO = #{equipNo}
SELECT AREA_CODE areaCode, AREA_NAME areaName FROM tb_area WHERE AREA_CODE = #{areaCode}
SELECT STANDARD_CODE standardCode, STANDARD_NAME standardName FROM tb_area_standard WHERE STANDARD_CODE = #{standardCode}
SELECT DESC_ id, DESC1_ text FROM tbpubcode01 WHERE CONFIG_CODE_ = 'EQUIP_TYPE'
SELECT AREA_CODE areaCode, AREA_TYPE areaType FROM tb_area WHERE AREA_CODE = #{areaCode}
SELECT m.AREA_CODE id, m.AREA_NAME name, m.SUPER_AREA_CODE pId, m.AREA_TYPE areaType, n.AREA_NAME pName FROM tb_area m LEFT JOIN tb_area n ON m.SUPER_AREA_CODE = n.AREA_CODE
